title: Bone Soldier
description: The Bone Soldier advances with the practiced economy of a trained warrior, its movements stripped of hesitation and fear. Though flesh has long since fallen away, the habits of the sword remainâ€”measured steps, precise cuts, and an uncanny sense of timing that recalls a life once spent in disciplined combat.
history: The ruins are crowded with the remains of those who once served, defended, or died with steel in hand. Some of these dead do not rest. Bound by the Ancestor's necromancers, the Bone Soldier rises with fragments of its former purpose intact. It does not think as it once did, but the motions of war endure, etched into bone by repetition and duty.
summary: A disciplined undead melee combatant that retains the weapon skill and precision it possessed in life.

appearance.features: Bare skull and exposed joints bound together by darkened sinew and residue

clothing.head: Tattered bandages wrapped around the skull
clothing.legs: Tattered trousers hanging from exposed bone

title: Bone Rabble
description: The Bone Rabble lurches forward in loose formation, a mass of poorly assembled remains animated by little more than momentum. It swings its crude weapon without finesse or intent, relying on numbers and persistence to overwhelm those who hesitate.
history: Not all who died in the ruins were warriors. Laborers, pilgrims, and the forgotten dead are stirred alongside soldiers, rising as broken imitations of life. These lesser skeletons are driven forward as fodder, their purpose simple: to occupy space, draw blows, and wear the living down through repetition.
summary: A weak but numerous undead attacker that relies on sheer presence rather than skill.

appearance.features: Misaligned bones and cracked skulls loosely held together

clothing.head: None
clothing.body: Tattered cloth clinging to the ribcage
clothing.legs: Worn trousers in various states of decay
